Package com.flag4j

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.core.TensorBase<T>
com.flag4j.core.VectorBase<double[]>
com.flag4j.Vector
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Vector extends VectorBase<double[]>
Real dense vector. Vectors may be oriented as row vectors, column vectors, or unoriented. See VectorOrientation for orientations.
See Also:
Serialized Form
